nodes.text: Risold was a male Zabrak lieutenant of the White Maw gang during the during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY he was part of Kandhar's posse during a meeting with an Imperial commander Tarkus. The meeting was interrupted by the Voidhound who openly questioned Kandhar's motives in the deal. The Devaronian responded by openly sentencing his men to death, after which they shot both him and the Imperial.
